dt: {bc}showing great care, attention, and effort {bc}marked by careful {d_link|unremitting|unremitting} attention or persistent application

dt.t: She tended her garden with {wi}assiduous{/wi} attention.

pt: {sc}busy{/sc} {sc}industrious{/sc} {sc}diligent{/sc} {sc}assiduous{/sc} {sc}sedulous{/sc} mean actively engaged or occupied. {sc}busy{/sc} chiefly stresses activity as opposed to idleness or leisure.

pt.t: too {it}busy{/it} to spend time with the children

pt: {sc}industrious{/sc} implies characteristic or habitual devotion to work.
{sc}diligent{/sc} suggests earnest application to some specific object or pursuit.

pt.t: very {it}diligent{/it} in her pursuit of a degree

shortdef: showing great care, attention, and effort : marked by careful unremitting attention or persistent application
